name: Murder Mystery Museum
description:
There's murder afoot in this 4-room museum, each with their own  furnishings and items to inspect.  See if you can find all of the clues!

Features assets used from:

Megascans objects via Quixel Bridge

Edith Finch - Sam Room

Edith Finch - House and Common Areas

Opera House Kit

Victorian Desk Model

Droshky Mode

Fire SFX

Music
